trans-unit.source: Creates a container within which other controls can share horizontal or vertical space.
trans-unit.target: Cria um contentor no qual outros controlos podem partilhar espaço horizontal ou vertical.

trans-unit.source: Use a ToolStripPanel to hold one or more <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> or user-defined controls.
trans-unit.target: Utilize um ToolStripPanel para conter uma ou mais <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>ou definido pelo utilizador controlos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: You might find that one or more ToolStripPanel controls meet the needs of your application better than a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> if you do not need the four panels and the central <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel>.
trans-unit.target: Poderá achar que um ou mais controlos de ToolStripPanel satisfazem as necessidades da sua aplicação melhor do que um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>se não terá dos painéis de quatro e o centro <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>

trans-unit.source: You can use only one panel if you so choose, and ToolStripPanel works well in Multiple Document Interface (MDI) scenarios.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar apenas um painel se, por isso, escolha e ToolStripPanel funciona bem em cenários de vários documentos Interface MDI ().

trans-unit.source: Each ToolStripPanel is expandable and collapsible.
trans-unit.target: Cada ToolStripPanel é possível expandir e expansível.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"></xref> automatically adjusts its size when the form is resized.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"> </xref> ajusta automaticamente o respetivo tamanho quando o formulário é redimensionado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"></xref> automatically resizes; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"> </xref> será redimensionado automaticamente; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.AutoSize*>alterações de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.AutoSize*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Begins the initialization of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Começa a inicialização de uma <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"> </xref> controlos.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"> </xref> controlos.

trans-unit.source: Gets the space, in pixels, that is specified by default between controls.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o espaço de, em pixels, que é especificado por predefinição entre controlos.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref> that represents the default space between controls.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"> </xref> que representa o espaço de predefinição entre controlos.

trans-unit.source: Gets the internal spacing, in pixels, of the contents of a control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o espaçamento interno, em pixels, do conteúdo de um controlo.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref> that represents the internal spacing of the contents of a control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"> </xref> que representa o espaçamento interno do conteúdo de um controlo.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Liberta os recursos não geridos utilizados pelo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"> </xref> e opcionalmente liberta os recursos geridos.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método é denominado pelo público `Dispose` método e <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>método.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose`invoca protegida `Dispose(Boolean)` método com o `disposing` parâmetro definido como `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>invoca `Dispose` com `disposing` definido como `false`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> references.
trans-unit.target: Quando o `disposing` parâmetro for true, este método versões retidos por quaisquer objetos geridos de todos os recursos que este <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>referências.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Este método invoca o `Dispose` método de cada objeto referenciado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para libertar recursos geridos e; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para libertar recursos apenas não geridos.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets which control borders are docked to its parent control and determines how a control is resized with its parent.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define os limites do controlo estão ancorados ao seu controlo principal e determina a forma como um controlo é redimensionado com o respetivo elemento principal.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The default is None.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é nenhum.

trans-unit.source: Ends the initialization of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Termina a inicialização de uma <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Adiciona especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> para um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"> </xref> na localização especificada.

trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> to add to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"></xref>.

trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> coordena representando o x-y-cliente e, em pixels, da nova localização para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> to a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"></xref> in the specified row.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> para um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"> </xref> na linha especificada.

trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> to add to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"></xref>.

trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Int32>que representa o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow"> </xref> ao qual o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> é adicionado.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: The row parameter is less than zero (0).
trans-unit.target: O row parâmetro é inferior a zero (0).

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> to a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"></xref> at the specified coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> para um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"> </xref> nas coordenadas especificadas.

trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> to add to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"></xref>.

trans-unit.target: A coordenada do cliente horizontal, em pixels.

trans-unit.source: The vertical client coordinate, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada do cliente vertical, em pixels.

trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ControlAdded"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The OnControlAdded method is called when a child control is added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.
trans-unit.target: O método de OnControlAdded é chamado quando um controlo subordinado é adicionado à <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o processador de eventos através de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnControlAdded method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O método OnControlAdded também permite que as classes derivadas processar o evento sem anexar um delegado.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Este é a preferido técnica para processar o evento de uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ControlEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ControlEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados do evento.
